name: Troll Simulator 3D
description:
A really amazing Troll Simulator 3D game!

Research the real 3d medieval world. People hate trolls out there - you must punish them all! Crush everything on your way and gain enough resources to enter epic battles outside city !

- Watch your hungry level !
- Shake trees and eat apples
- Hit stones and chests to get coins and experience
- Fight with knights
- In-room scenes
- Day/Night cycle
- Smooth gameplay
- and much more!
